divs: sighting detailsobserved an aircraft while photographing the sun rising. an orb appeared for around six to ten seconds at exactly 11\20\2013 7:30.40. the aircraft appeared to be chasing the object. i cannot approximate the size. easily the size of a large house yet spherical.
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Durham
There were no other sightings in Durham on or around November 20th 2013
